sense.def:
A mark
je majhna packa ali poškodovan delček površine.

seg.quote: ...grease marks.
There seems to be a dirty mark on it.

sense.def:
A mark
je tudi številka ali črka, ki pove, kako dobri smo bili pri preskusu ali izpitu.

seg.quote: You need 120 marks out of 200 to pass.
...anxious for good marks.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
reaches a particular mark
, doseže tisto stopnjo.

seg.quote: Unemployment is well over the three million mark.
Once past the halfway mark he found that he was running more easily.

sense.def:
A mark of something
je znamenje ali značilna lastnost nečesa.

seg.quote: I took this smile as a mark of recognition.
The scene bore all the marks of a country wedding.

sense.def:
Kadar neka snov
marks a surface
, poškoduje in zamaže neko površino.

seg.quote: Vinegar, lemon juice, egg and salt can mark cutlery.

sense.def:
Kadar učitelj
marks a student's work
, se odloči, kako dober je učenčev izdelek in na ta izdelek napiše pripombe ali oceno.

Kadar človek
marks something
, na nečem naredi kakšno znamenje ali na nekaj zapiše besede.

seg.quote: ...reports marked Top Secret.
See that everything is marked with your initials.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
marks a place or position
, kaže, v katerem kraju ali v kakšnem položaju nekaj je ali je bilo.

seg.quote: The area of burned clay marks the position of several Roman furnaces.

sense.def:
Kadar neki dogodek
marks a particular change or anniversary
, se zgodi v času neke spremembe ali obletnice in opozarja nanjo.

seg.quote: The film marks a turning point in Allen's career.
The concert is to mark the 75th Anniversary year of the composer's death.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
marks someone as a particular type of person
, nekega človeka označuje kot osebo določene vrste.

seg.quote: These signs marked him as a bachelor eager to wed.

sense.def:
Kadar je človek
slow off the mark
, se na okoliščine odziva počasi. Če pa je
quick off the mark
, se nanje odziva hitro.

seg.quote: Neighbours were always quick off the mark to ask him round when his wife was away.

sense.def:
To make or leave one's mark on something
pomeni na nekaj pomembno vplivati.

seg.quote: ...a scholar who has made his mark in history.

sense.def:
Kadar je nekaj
wide of the mark
, je popolnoma nepravilno.

seg.quote: His assessment of the situation might be rather wide of the mark.

sense.def:
Človek
is marking time
, kadar dela nekaj dolgočasnega ali nepomembnega, medtem ko čaka, da se zgodi nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: I've been marking time reading books.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
marks off an item on a list
, na seznamu zaznamuje neko točko kot opravljeno.

seg.quote: Each day was marked off with a neat X.
